71020.「<cs_pchero>さま。遅れて 申し訳ありません。\n ここから 強く 魔:
Sorry to keep you waiting, <cs_pchero>.
I sensed a strong presence of a monster, but I
see you've already taken care of it.

71021.「星天のペンダントは ここにある\n 何かに 共鳴したはず……。:
The Starry Pendant must have resonated with
something here...

71023.「壊れていますが ペンダントのようです。\n <cs_pchero>さまの倒した:
It looks to be some kind of pendant, but it's
broken. Was the monster that you defeated
holding it?

71024.「これは……どういうことでしょう？\n このペンダントは 私の持つ\n 星天のペ:
What could...this mean? This pendant is
strikingly similar to my Starry Pendant.

71025.「いえ……。似ているというよりも\n まったく 同じものに……。\n 同じ……同:
No... It's not just similar, it's...exactly
the same... The same...pendant...?

71027.「……メルエ。シャデルが もう何日も\n 冒険から 帰ってきていないそうだ。\n:
Merue... It's been days and Shadel still hasn't returned from his journey. He went to a very dangerous place, so it's possible
that he...

71028.「大丈夫よ。すぐに このペンダントを使って\n 無事だって 報告してくるわ。\n:
It's okay. I'll use the pendant so he can let
us know he's okay. He's an amazing
adventurer, you know.

71029.<center>……それから 数日の時が 流れても\nシャデル叔父さんからの連絡:
...a few days had passed, and I never heard
from my uncle Shadel again.

71030.「シャデル叔父さんは 誰も行ったことがない\n すごい場所で 冒険の真っ最中なの:
He's in the middle of an amazing adventure in
an amazing place that's yet to be discovered.
He's just busy. He hasn't had a chance to...

71031.「……メルエ。\n 落ち着いて 聞いてほしい。:
Merue... I want you to stay calm and listen to
me.

71032.「シャデルが 見つかった……。\n 洞くつの奥で倒れていたのを\n 他の冒険者が:
They found Shadel... Another adventurer found
him lying in the depths of a cave. He was
already...

71034.「いつか…… 私の病気が治ったら\n 一緒に冒険しようって 約束したのに……。\:
He promised... He promised that someday we'd
go on an adventure together when my illness
went away... Why...? *sob, sob*...

71036.「あなたは……誰？\n どうして こんな所にいるの？: Who...are you? What are you doing here?

71038.「ボク……帰らなくちゃいけなくて……。\n だけど 追いだされてしまったから\n:
I... I have to go home...but I was cast out,
so I can't go back by myself...

71040.「おねえちゃん ボクといっしょに\n 帰ってくれないかな。おねえちゃんと\n い:
Hey, miss...do you think you could come with
me? If you're there with me, then I'm sure
I'll be able to go home.

71041.「そしたら ボク…… おねえちゃんの頼み\n どんなことでも きいてあげるよ！: I'll...I'll do anything that you ask of me!

71043.「私は……自分の足で 歩けないの。\n この部屋から出ることさえ できないのよ。:
I...I'm not able to walk. I can't even leave
this room, so there's no way I can go with
you.

71044.「わかった。\n それが お姉ちゃんの願いなんだね？:
I understand.
So that's what you want, then?

71047.「絶対に治らないって\n どんなお医者様も さじを投げたのよ？\n それが どう:
Every doctor that saw me gave up, saying I
would never be cured... So how did you...?

71049.「これで ボクといっしょに帰ってくれるよね？: You'll come with me now, right?

71052.「……すべてを 思いだしました。\n いったい何が 私を\n 世告げの姫として:
I remember everything. Just what was it that
drove me to become a Princess of
Prophecy...?

71053.「ありがとうございます <cs_pchero>さま。\n 心ばかりの品ですが 受:
Thank you for your help, <cs_pchero>.
I know it's not much, but please take it.

71054.「……私に 冒険の話を聞かせてくれた\n シャデル叔父さんは この砂岩の洞くつで:
I believe that my uncle Shadel was attacked
and killed by the monsters in this cave...

71055.「ですが 最期に 私の記憶を取り戻す\n きっかけを 残してくれましたね……。:
But in the end, you gave me a chance to
remember the memories I had lost...

71056.「決戦の時は 近づいています。\n <cs_pchero>さまは コゼットを訪ね:
The time for the final battle is soon
approaching. Please go and see Cosette,
and go to Rhodia's side.

71231.<center>世告げの姫となる前の私は\n自由のない カゴの中の鳥でした。:
Before I became a Princess of Prophecy, I was
a bird in a cage with no freedom at all.

71232.<center>……私は 生まれつき 重い病をわずらい\n自分の足で 立つことも:
I was born with a severe illness, unable to
even stand on my own feet... I spent my
days being treated.

71233.<center>このペンダントは 父が用意してくれたもの。\nどんなに離れていて:
My father gave this pendant to me. No matter
how far, our pendants had magic that allowed
us to speak with one another.

71234.<center>ペンダントの片方は 部屋から出られない私を\nふびんに思った父が:
My father, unhappy with my inability to leave
my room, gave one of the pendants to my uncle
Shadel. He was an adventurer.

71235.<center>私の 唯一の楽しみは\nシャデル叔父さんが ペンダント越しに\n:
My one pleasure was hearing the stories of
my uncle's adventures through my pendant.
